definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The bold line is the link to the person's profile.
sentences.chinese: 加粗的那一行是所搜索對象的概要鏈接。

sentences.english: Lit graphics, written in large bold font the name of your shop and service.
sentences.chinese: 點亮了圖形，寫在大字體加粗你的店鋪的名稱和服務。

sentences.english: Don't underestimate how bolding certain words or sentences can make an otherwise benign statement one with emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 不要低估加粗的詞句會怎樣強調了本來平和的表述。

sentences.english: In this layout, it’s advisable to use bold fonts for input field labels.
sentences.chinese: 在這種佈局方式中，建議對標籤使用加粗字體。

sentences.english: But the swelling of the segments was promoted by Kn and ethylene.
sentences.chinese: 激動素和乙烯抑制切段伸長但卻促進了它的加粗。

sentences.english: Make the unselected font bold by clicking on the bold button.
sentences.chinese: 通過單擊加粗按鈕來加粗未選中的字體。

sentences.english: Make the unselected font bold by clicking on the bold button.
sentences.chinese: 通過單擊加粗按鈕來加粗未選中的字體。

sentences.english: Underline, bold face, and use bullets to emphasize your credentials.
sentences.chinese: 下劃線，加粗，並使用重點突出強調你的榮譽。

sentences.english: The parts of the code shown in bold are explained further following the listing.
sentences.chinese: 代碼中加粗顯示的部分將在後面作進一步的解釋。

sentences.english: Snippets include one or more of your query words shown in boldface.
sentences.chinese: 富摘要信息包括一個或多個以加粗顯示的查詢詞。

sentences.english: In particular, note the bolded code.
sentences.chinese: 特別要注意加粗顯示的代碼。

sentences.english: Make the font bold by clicking on the bold button.
sentences.chinese: 通過單擊加粗按鈕來加粗字體。

sentences.english: Make the font bold by clicking on the bold button.
sentences.chinese: 通過單擊加粗按鈕來加粗字體。

sentences.english: The selected cell will be shaded, and any text entered will appear in bold.
sentences.chinese: 選中的單元格會成灰色，任何輸入的文本將被加粗。

sentences.english: Make the selected font bold by clicking on the bold button.
sentences.chinese: 通過單擊加粗按鈕來加粗選中的字體。

sentences.english: Make the selected font bold by clicking on the bold button.
sentences.chinese: 通過單擊加粗按鈕來加粗選中的字體。

definition: capital letters/uppercase letters/block letters/banker's anti-fraud numerals
Chinese underdot (punct. used for emphasis, sim. to Western italics)
